text: Margherita, Archduchess of Austria-Este (née Princess Margherita of Savoy- Aosta; 7 April 1930 – 10 January 2022) was an Italian aristocrat. She was the first-born child of the late Amedeo, 3rd Duke of Aosta, and Princess Anne d'Orléans. She was married to Robert, Archduke of Austria-Este from 1953 until his death in 1996. They had five children; including Prince Lorenz of Belgium. Margherita died on 10 January 2022 in Basel, Switzerland at the age of 91.La mère du prince Lorenz est décédée : Margherita de Savoie-Aoste avait 91 ans ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:People from Naples Category:Italian princes and princesses
title: Margherita, Archduchess of Austria-Este
